name: caovcom
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2
body: |- wceq(co(c0, c1, c2), co(c2, c1, c0))
-| wceq(co(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1)), co(cv(s1), c1, cv(s0)))
